title: Largest cities in Ukraine 2016
summary: This is a bar chart representing Month in the x axis and Residents in millions in the y axis.
Month Kyïv (Kiev) has the highest Residents in millions and Mariupol' has the lowest Residents in millions.
The difference of Residents in millions between the highest and lowest Month is 2.46.
min_summary: This bar chart has 10 columns on the x axis representing Month, and Residents in millions in each Month on the y axis.
The maximum Residents in millions 2.91 is found at Month Kyïv (Kiev) and the minimum is found at Mariupol' where Month is 0.45.
mid_summary: This is a bar chart representing Month in the x axis and Residents in millions in the y axis.
Month Kyïv (Kiev) has the highest Residents in millions and Mariupol' has the lowest Residents in millions.
The difference of Residents in millions between the highest and lowest Month is 2.46.
max_summary: This bar chart has 10 columns on the x axis representing Month, and Residents in millions in each Month on the y axis.
The maximum Residents in millions 2.91 is found at Month Kyïv (Kiev) and the minimum is found at Mariupol' where Month is 0.45.
The second highest Residents in millions is appeared to be the Month Charkiv.
The difference of Residents in millions between the highest and lowest Month is 2.46.
Residents in millions at Month Kyïv (Kiev) is 2.91 , second place is Charkiv at 1.45, and thirdly is Odėsa at 1.01.
The Residents in millions has declined over the past 10 Months.
The average Residents in millions in all 10 Months is 1.03.
